short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Builds a command line for 'curl/wget' tools to enable the download of data on a console only session.
short.fr: CurlWget g√©nere le texte pour curl et wget afin de pouvoir telecharger un fichier en mode 'ligne de commande'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CurlWget is a little plugin providing a 'curl' or 'wget' command line string to copy/paste on a console only session (like a unix/linux remote shell/headless server) where a graphical user interface browser can not be used.

Changelog:
7 Aug 2024 - migrated to new manifest V3 to comply with Chrome. If unexpected behavior detected, just describe it briefly and open a ticket.
long.fr: Builds a command line for 'curl/wget' tools to enable the download of data on a console only session.
